May 17, 1947 D Welsh Area (Fourth Section)
Welsh Area (Fourth Section) 40 Test Piece Contest Welsh Area welsh-area-fourth-section National Championship of Great Britain (Fourth Section Final) None Wales
Fourth
Divertimento [Ball]
Cory Hall, Cardiff, Cardiff County, Wales, UK *Cwmaman are listed twice in the official contest programme playing under W, Wood in the Fourth Section as 'Cwmaman Institute', however they are also listed in the Third Section under W.R Evans as 'Cwmaman Silver'. Would anybody know if there were two separate bands at the time?
Feb. 7, 2013, 9:39 p.m. June 5, 2020, 5:42 p.m.
